metadata.title: CVE-2022-4973 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
(WordPress Core, in versions up to 6.0.2, is vulnerable to Authenticate...)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4973` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 6.4.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-l10n - 6.4.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyfour - 6.4.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentythree - 6.4.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 6.4.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
